TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MetaModel extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 ASP.NET Dynamic Data 所使用的一個或多個資料庫。

span.span: Represents one or multiple databases that are used by ASP.NET Dynamic Data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類型可讓您註冊一或多個動態資料的 Web 應用程式的資料內容。The type lets you register one or multiple data contexts for a Dynamic Data Web application. 資料內容是物件，表示資料庫連接。A data context is an object that represents a database connection. 資料內容都有一個資料模型，這代表可透過該連接的資料庫存取。A data context has access to one data model which represents a database that is available through that connection. 資料模型是物件，表示資料庫的資料實體以 CLR 型別。A data model is an object that represents a database's data entities as CLR types. 動態資料支援根據 LINQ to SQL 和 ADO.NET Entity Framework 資料模型。Dynamic Data supports data models based on LINQ to SQL and on the ADO.NET Entity Framework. 在 Visual Studio 中，您可以產生資料模型類型使用**LINQ to SQL 類別**範本或**ADO.NET 實體資料模型**範本。In Visual Studio, you can generate data-model types by using the **LINQ to SQL Classes** template or the **ADO.NET Entity Data Model** template. 這些範本會使用物件關聯式設計工具 （O/R 設計工具），LINQ to SQL 模型或 ADO.NET Entity Data Model Designer （實體設計工具） 的 Entity Framework 模型。These templates use the Object Relational Designer (O/R Designer) for the LINQ to SQL model, or the ADO.NET Entity Data Model Designer (Entity Designer) for the Entity Framework model. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類型才能使用自動 scaffold ASP.NET 網站中執行下列工作：The following example shows how to use type to perform the following tasks in order to use automatic scaffolding in an ASP.NET Web site: - 取得預設的資料內容中的資料模型。Get the data model for the default data context. - 取得指定的資料內容中的資料模型。Get the data model for a specified data context. - 評估的路徑 （決定的 URL） 指定的資料表。Evaluate the routing path (determine the URL) for a specified table. 此範例是由頁面和其程式碼後置檔案所組成。The example consists of a page and its code-behind file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel/CS/PlaceHolder.cs#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel/CS/PathModel.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel/VB/PathModel.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel/VB/PlaceHolder.vb#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel/CS/PathModel.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel/VB/PathModel.aspx.vb#2)] 若要編譯此範例，您需要下列項目：To compile the example, you need the following: - [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[vwd_exp_dev10_long](~/includes/vwd-exp-dev10-long-md.md)]。 or [!INCLUDE[vwd_exp_dev10_long](~/includes/vwd-exp-dev10-long-md.md)]. - Dynamic Data 網站。A Dynamic Data Web site. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 建立新動態資料網站上使用 Scaffolding](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1564aef2-9103-436a-9806-c8ad7abd616a)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Creating a New Dynamic Data Web Site Using Scaffolding](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1564aef2-9103-436a-9806-c8ad7abd616a). 請參閱這項功能的執行階段程式碼範例：[執行](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel)。See a run-time code example of this feature: [Run](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel).

exception.span: 如果已有資料內容註冊錯誤，任何方法都可以擲回這個例外狀況 (Exception)。

span.span: Can be thrown by any method if there has been a data context registration error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您通常會呼叫中的建構函式`Application_Start`Global.asax 檔案的方法。You typically call the constructor in the `Application_Start` method of the Global.asax file. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用建構函式來執行下列工作：The following example shows how to use the constructor to perform the following tasks: - 具現化類別。Instantiate the class. - 初始化並註冊執行個體。Initialize and register the instance. [!code-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel#99](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel/CS/global.asax.cs#99)] [!code-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel#99](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel/VB/global.asax.vb#99)]

summary.span: 執行個體化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Instantiates a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式判斷，讓它可以擷取使用資料模型是否全域登錄方法。This constructor determines whether the data model is registered globally so that it can be retrieved using the method. 它可讓您建立多個模型，並同時避免衝突類型使用相同的實體類型。It enables you to create multiple models and use the same entity types while avoiding type conflicts. 您通常會呼叫中的建構函式`Application_Start`Global.asax 檔案的方法。You typically call the constructor in the `Application_Start` method of the Global.asax file.

summary.span: 取得應用程式所建立的第一個資料模型執行個體。

span.span: Gets the first instance of a data model that is created by the application.
The data-model instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會提供簡單的方式來參考的預設資料模型執行個體。This property provides a simple way to reference the default data-model instance. 如果應用程式使用多個模型，您必須提供自己的方式來儲存其他資料模型的參考。If the application uses multiple models, you must provide your own way to store references to the additional data models. 若要尋找特定的資料模型，請呼叫方法。To find a specific data model, call the method. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性方法來取得預設資料模型。The following example shows how to use the property in the method to get the default data model. 如需完整範例，請參閱類別概觀。For a complete example, see the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel#22](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel/CS/PathModel.aspx.cs#22)] [!code-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel#22](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel/VB/PathModel.aspx.vb#22)]

summary.span: 取得或設定網站中 [DynamicData] 資料夾的虛擬路徑。

span.span: Gets or sets the virtual path of the DynamicData folder in the Web site.
The virtual path of the DynamicData folder.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可讓您變更 [動態] 資料夾的虛擬路徑。This property enables you to change the virtual path of the DynamicData folder. 預設值是"~/DynamicData"。The default value is "~/DynamicData".

[執行](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel&spage=GetTable.aspx)線上這項功能的範例。[Run](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel&spage=GetTable.aspx) an online example of this feature. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用多載的方法來執行下列工作：The following example shows how to use the overloaded methods to perform the following tasks: - 取得指定之資料表的物件。Get the object for the specified table. - 存取所包含的中繼資料資訊物件。Access the metadata information that is contained by the object. 此範例是由頁面和其程式碼後置檔案所組成。The example consists of a page and its code-behind file. MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void ResetRegistrationException() cil managed

summary.span: 重設任何可能已發生的先前內容註冊錯誤。

span.span: Resets any previous context registration error that might have occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料內容註冊期間發生錯誤時，例外狀況會快取，並在後續的所有作業中擲回。When an error occurs during data-context registration, the exception is cached and thrown on all subsequent operations. 比方說，如果錯誤發生在應用程式啟動時，它會擲回每個要求。For example, if an error occurs at application start, it is thrown on every request. 呼叫此方法，以清除錯誤，並啟用新的內容登錄来執行。Call this method to clear the error and to enable a new context registration to be performed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Tables As ReadOnlyCollection(Of MetaTable)

summary.span: 取得屬於資料模型之所有資料表的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of all the tables that are part of the data model.

value.span: 集合，包含屬於資料模型的資料表。

span.span: A collection that contains the tables that belong to the data model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合包含資料模型，其中包含不會顯示資料表中的所有資料表 （不是動態的資料 scaffolding 的一部分）。The collection contains all the tables in the data model, which includes the tables that are not visible (are not part of Dynamic Data scaffolding). [執行](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel&spage=TablesMenu.aspx)線上這項功能的範例。[Run](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel&spage=TablesMenu.aspx) an online example of this feature. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用和屬性，以執行下列工作：The following example shows how to use the and properties to perform the following tasks: - 取得資料模型中的所有資料表的集合，並顯示在`GridView`控制項。Get a collection of all the tables in a data model and show them in a `GridView` control. - 資料模型中取得的可見的資料表集合，並顯示在`GridView`控制項。Get a collection of the visible tables in a data model and show them in a `GridView` control. 此範例是由頁面和其程式碼後置檔案所組成。The example consists of a page and its code-behind file. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel/CS/TablesMenu.aspx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel/VB/TablesMenu.aspx#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel/CS/TablesMenu.aspx.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel/VB/TablesMenu.aspx.vb#6)]

summary.span: 嘗試取得與指定之資料表相關聯的中繼資料。

span.span: Attempts to get the metadata that is associated with the specified table.

.method public hidebysig instance bool TryGetTable(string uniqueTableName, [out] class System.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable& table) cil managed
Public Function TryGetTable (uniqueTableName As String, ByRef table As MetaTable) As Boolean
public: bool TryGetTable(System::String ^ uniqueTableName, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Web::DynamicData::MetaTable ^ % table);

param.name: uniqueTableName
param.span: 唯一識別資料表的名稱。

span.span: The name that uniquely identifies the table.

param.name: table
param.span: 當這個方法傳回時，如果它有找到要求的資料表，則會包含該資料表的中繼資料。

span.span: When this method returns, and if it has found the requested table, contains the metadata for that table.

param.span: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 嘗試取得與指定之資料表相關聯的中繼資料。

span.span: Attempts to get the metadata that is associated with the specified table.

returns.span: 如果有找到資料表中繼資料則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the table metadata is found; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會取得與指定之資料表相關聯的中繼資料。This method gets the metadata that is associated with the specified table. 如果資料表沒有找到，則這個方法會傳回`false`。If the table is not found, this method returns `false`. 這不同於方法，這個方法會擲回例外狀況，如果找不到資料表。This differs from the method, which throws an exception if the table is not found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會取得與指定之資料表相關聯的中繼資料。This method gets the metadata that is associated with the specified table. 如果資料表沒有找到，則這個方法會傳回`false`。If the table is not found, this method returns `false`. 這不同於方法，這個方法會擲回例外狀況，如果找不到資料表。This differs from the method, which throws an exception if the table is not found.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VisibleTables As List(Of MetaTable)

summary.span: 取得資料模型中可見資料表的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the visible tables in the data model.

value.span: 可見資料表意指已啟用 Scaffolding 的資料表，

span.span: A visible table refers to a table that has scaffolding enabled.

value.span: 也就是 List.aspx 頁面所存在的資料表。

span.span: This means that it is a table for which a List.aspx page exists.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來取得資料模型中顯示資料表的集合。The following example shows how to use the property to get a collection of the visible tables in the data model. 如需完整範例，請參閱類別概觀。For a complete example, see the class overview.
